categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Manage top-level research categories and their hierarchy.
categories.createDescription: Define the name, slug, optional parent, and description.
categories.editDialogDescription: Update metadata or reassign the parent category.
categories.deleteConfirm: Delete this category? This action cannot be undone.

tags.title: Tags
tags.createDescription: Provide a name and slug for the new tag.
tags.editDialogDescription: Rename or adjust the slug for this tag.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile and account settings
settings.profileInformationDescription: Update your name and email address
settings.resend: Click here to resend the verification email.
settings.verificationSent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
settings.passwordDescription: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure

researcher.profileDescription: Share your background, experiences, and research areas.
researcher.title: Title
researcher.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
researcher.fixErrors: Please fix the highlighted fields before saving.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.description: Delete your account and all of its resources
deleteAccount.warningBody: Please proceed with caution, this cannot be undone.
deleteAccount.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will also be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.enabledDescription: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login.
twoFactor.disabledDescription: Enable two-factor authentication to require a secure pin during login from a TOTP-compatible app.
